08a2f4be6bf7e693d0b1150fa2fea6dc6d023999.query:
SELECT parties.*, boards.board_name as "board_name?" FROM parties
        LEFT JOIN boards on boards.id = parties.board_id
            WHERE parties.board_id = $1

08fa6d03c815aa9a35a6c9864bfa69578d82647c.query:
INSERT INTO favorite_articles (user_id, article_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id

0bf301c69184642edf8e8728b7e2c3263a5fdf07.query: UPDATE articles SET energy = energy + $1 WHERE id = $2

107d960da9bc8895c2c7578824d48bcc42f61d3b.query:
SELECT
            article_bonds.from_id,
            tag as bond_tag,
            articles.category,
            articles.title,
            users.user_name as author_name,
            users.id as author_id,
            articles.id,
            articles.create_time,
            articles.anonymous,
            boards.board_name
        FROM article_bonds
            INNER JOIN articles ON articles.id = article_bonds.to_id
            INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
            INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
            WHERE article_bonds.from_id = ANY($1);

115e3162f3fac9f2f805df118d1ed1a4b4b53abc.query:
SELECT a.id FROM articles a WHERE EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1 FROM article_string_fields f
                        WHERE f.name = $1 AND f.article_id = a.id AND f.value ~ $2
                    ) AND a.id = ANY($3)

13452f22fbf0ae87b640e4428967f4f0bf2434d0.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                users.id,
                users.user_name,
                users.email,
                users.sentence,
                users.energy,
                users.introduction,
                users.gender,
                users.birth_year,
                users.job,
                users.city,
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hater_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hater_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "follower_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "follower_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hating_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hating_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "following_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "following_count_private!"
            FROM users) SELECT * FROM metas WHERE metas.id = $1

1384b91c3f7f116bedb51f275a3c98fd99e92a29.query:
UPDATE drafts
        SET
        board_id=$2,
        title=$3,
        category=$4,
        content=$5,
        anonymous=$6,
        bonds=$7
        WHERE id=$8 AND author_id=$1

14db105952e6d3dfd3dbc4a26d43aa793ed33395.query:
INSERT INTO article_string_fields
                        (article_id, name, value)
                        VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

159100502e6991e0c638d3013213ede3e2a6f936.query: SELECT author_id FROM articles WHERE id = $1

180c5e60193dc2a5bb28035f115eb40da11b3d68.query:
INSERT INTO chat.direct_messages (direct_chat_id, sender_id, content)
		VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
		RETURNING id

18b0b8b14f55ff490a78b6d996f56260405c6d16.query:
INSERT INTO parties (party_name, board_id)
                SELECT $1, boards.id
                FROM boards
                WHERE boards.board_name = $2
                RETURNING id

1999b8563aa500182a7380543f69402a0d2c80bd.query:
UPDATE chat.direct_chats
        SET read_time_2 = $3
		WHERE id = $1 AND user_id_2 = $2

1a4e98bf936a2d308516cc28ac8d0b9d407e5364.query: SELECT kind, is_public FROM user_relations WHERE from_user = $1 AND to_user = $2

1dfba4063eb59e7d88aaae611dbd10d388013248.query:
INSERT INTO user_relations (from_user, to_user, kind, is_public) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::text::user_relation_kind, $4)
        on CONFLICT(from_user, to_user) DO UPDATE set kind=$3::text::user_relation_kind, is_public=$4

1fad9a11be067106f152f6af9b5bf889fa86987b.query: INSERT INTO users (user_name, password_hashed, salt, email) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) RETURNING id

25af72249eb8564302007c114ebd9a3d9d5f45ad.query:
SELECT count(*) FROM subscribed_boards
    WHERE subscribed_boards.board_id = $1

296ad24a0508a61e62dd39d5ed2ed1235a88caa1.query:
SELECT n.*, users.user_name as user2_name, boards.board_name, a1.title as article1_title, a2.title as article2_title
        FROM notifications n
        LEFT JOIN users on n.user2_id = users.id
        LEFT JOIN boards on n.board_id = boards.id
        LEFT JOIN articles a1 on n.article1_id = a1.id
        LEFT JOIN articles a2 on n.article2_id = a2.id
        WHERE user_id = $1 AND ($2 OR NOT n.read)

29e275a7248d92596c03596eb571e3e7aed48fa6.query:
SELECT article_id, name, value FROM article_string_fields
        WHERE article_id = $1;

2bbdc41466fe31786040308288b88cf255d36520.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                users.id,
                users.user_name,
                users.email,
                users.sentence,
                users.energy,
                users.introduction,
                users.gender,
                users.birth_year,
                users.job,
                users.city,
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hater_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hater_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "follower_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "follower_count_private!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "hating_count_public!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND kind = 'hate'
                    AND is_public = false) AS "hating_count_private!",
                (

                    AND kind = 'follow'
                    AND is_public = true) AS "following_count_public!",

                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)

                WHERE

                    AND is_public = false) AS "following_count_private!"

2d680e691d71f2259578f9894d5b22d3ff786030.query: SELECT *, 0::bigint as "popularity!" FROM boards WHERE id = $1

2fbdaf88f6076824b4407f8ab57b26d7ccb62a53.query:
UPDATE chat.direct_chats
        SET read_time_1 = $3
		WHERE id = $1 AND user_id_1 = $2

319e1d5294248f489601eef9999e511e5a989d3c.query:
SELECT chat.direct_chats.id,
            u1.user_name as name_1,
            u2.user_name as name_2,
            user_id_1,
            user_id_2,
            read_time_1,
            read_time_2,
            m.create_time as time,
            m.id as msg_id,
            m.content as text,
            m.sender_id as sender_id
        FROM chat.direct_chats
        JOIN users u1
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_1 = u1.id
        JOIN users u2
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_2 = u2.id
        JOIN chat.direct_messages m
        on chat.direct_chats.last_message = m.id
        WHERE (user_id_1 = $1 OR user_id_2 = $1)

3b5c02518cd4b2ffafdf2159c5c4e4118f3db6e5.query:
INSERT INTO chat.direct_chats (user_id_1, user_id_2)
		VALUES ($1, $2)
		RETURNING id

3ba713a8e7288d064a846d962d0c72416ee3cd37.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                )
            SELECT  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas WHERE id = $1

3c3ce4a98fa6967a7ef2cd85a7f689a8fea3f808.query:
SELECT
            articles.id,
            COUNT(DISTINCT article_bonds.from_id) AS "replies_count!",
            COUNT(DISTINCT comments.id) AS "comments_count!"
        FROM
            articles
            LEFT JOIN article_bonds ON articles.id = article_bonds.to_id
            LEFT JOIN comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id
        WHERE
            articles.id = ANY($1)
        GROUP BY
            articles.id

420806ff0fb30a53409a92f879884ca39cb442fd.query:
SELECT images.id
        FROM images
        INNER JOIN users
        ON users.avatar = images.id
        WHERE users.id = $1

463423331510266b0f13b4f310a22883bf653fdf.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                )
            SELECT 
        DISTINCT ab.from_id, ab.to_id,
        ab.energy as bond_energy, ab.id as bond_id, ab.tag as bond_tag, 
         metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN article_bonds ab on metas.id = ab.to_id
        WHERE ab.from_id = $1
        AND ($2 OR category = ANY($3))
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

482dce2bc7d06dae44298101f21d7bef6512ae07.query:
INSERT INTO parties (party_name)
                VALUES ($1) RETURNING id

50a32f9f8e8fe35ce70d23c04cdae33e5d851fd3.query:

         WHERE inviter_id = $1

52d0365358cbdf1826d63dbeed672f4e3adbcac6.query:

        LEFT JOIN boards on boards.id = parties.board_id

    WHERE user_id = $1

UPDATE notifications SET read = true

        WHERE id = $2

870acec27692e6a724b9c061fe2323f9f2486ec9.query: INSERT INTO signup_tokens (email, birth_year, gender, license_id, token, inviter_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)

8bdda9a40018df78b700c8838200b6d2d35f0276.query:
INSERT INTO boards (board_name, board_type, detail, title, force, ruling_party_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)
        RETURNING id

8e7afd2960de53ce27868f03de76208b468d66dd.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                )
            SELECT  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        WHERE ($1 OR board_name = $2)
        AND ($3 OR (author_name = $4 AND (anonymous = false OR author_id = $5)))
        AND ($6 OR category = $7)
        AND ($8 OR create_time < $9)
        AND ($10 OR create_time > $11)
        AND ($12 OR title ~ $13)
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

93c639136fb231f8b7f6797ba96d8cb94180e332.query:
UPDATE reset_password SET is_used = TRUE
        FROM users
        WHERE reset_password.user_id = (SELECT user_id from reset_password where token = $1)

            WHERE users.id = $2

9ba2b449f921b2d264878ebd3d46605bfde138d3.query: SELECT 1 as t from signup_tokens where email = $1 LIMIT 1

9d46b2f9d0bbc3e250a649e743b7b02aa96ad24a.query:
UPDATE chat.direct_chats
        SET last_message = $1
        WHERE id = $2

9e1c99a983c23a1604ccbd713936a03f6494a92e.query:
SELECT * FROM articles
        WHERE author_id IN (SELECT to_user FROM user_relations WHERE from_user = $1) OR
        id IN (SELECT article_id FROM tracking_articles WHERE user_id = $1)
        ORDER BY create_time DESC
        LIMIT $2

a5694a6fc51bd98daf7d483a05402539226e6b96.query:
UPDATE users SET (password_hashed, salt) = ($1, $2)
        FROM reset_password
        WHERE reset_password.token = $3 and reset_password.user_id = users.id

a7c7e6f40b37b0b46437dda8f6573bfc0925b2cd.query:
SELECT chat.direct_chats.id,
            u1.user_name as name_1,
            u2.user_name as name_2,
            user_id_1,
            user_id_2,
            read_time_1,
            read_time_2,
            m.create_time as time,
            m.id as msg_id,
            m.content as text,
            m.sender_id as sender_id
        FROM chat.direct_chats
        JOIN users u1
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_1 = u1.id
        JOIN users u2
        ON chat.direct_chats.user_id_2 = u2.id
        JOIN chat.direct_messages m
        on chat.direct_chats.last_message = m.id
        WHERE chat.direct_chats.id = $1

            SELECT  metas.id,

dcf71e024bce8f58d3f9cb382f0b92ec7085b8b4.query:

                        WHERE f.name = $1 AND f.article_id = a.id AND f.value >= $2 AND f.value <= $3
                    ) AND a.id = ANY($4)

        WHERE user_id_1 = $1 AND user_id_2 = $2

        WHERE id = $1

eb8eea48ca99fc0446b6457aa7e7698ee0b36f32.query:
SELECT article_id, name, value FROM article_string_fields
        WHERE article_id = ANY($1);

ec3515677b92862026b92dbefb01389c8934076c.query:
SELECT user_name FROM reset_password
         JOIN users on reset_password.user_id = users.id
         WHERE token = $1 AND is_used = false

f11f4a59f8c774c6dee88760e704f7ec2a869ee3.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                )
            SELECT  metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN favorite_articles ON metas.id = favorite_articles.article_id
        WHERE favorite_articles.user_id = $1
        ORDER BY favorite_articles.create_time DESC

f1df4842f2a606e8cc26904c20883ec3a4e2288d.query: SELECT 1 as t from users where email = $1 LIMIT 1

f379223294faf8264e24cf5e16ff6b801cd050c5.query:
SELECT parties.*, boards.board_name as "board_name?" FROM parties
        LEFT JOIN boards on boards.id = parties.board_id
            WHERE parties.party_name = $1

f51b3c983436737b65808402a0bc1df03ae99912.query: DELETE FROM favorite_articles WHERE user_id = $1 AND article_id = $2

f6ded42e759d89ff66369f14d9d4de786035b97e.query:
SELECT
        drafts.id, drafts.author_id, drafts.board_id,
        boards.board_name,
        drafts.category as "category?",
        drafts.title,
        drafts.content,
        drafts.create_time,
        drafts.edit_time,
        drafts.anonymous,
        drafts.bonds
        FROM drafts
        JOIN boards ON drafts.board_id = boards.id
        WHERE drafts.author_id = $1
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

fbaa2fb628199fce8a64bb3968327de84715f730.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                )
            SELECT 
        DISTINCT ab.from_id, ab.to_id,
        ab.energy as bond_energy, ab.id as bond_id, ab.tag as bond_tag, 
         metas.id,
                metas.energy,
                fields,
                board_id,
                board_name,
                category,
                title,
                author_id,
                author_name,
                digest AS digest_content,
                digest_truncated,
                metas.create_time,
                anonymous FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN article_bonds ab ON metas.id = ab.from_id
        WHERE ab.to_id = $1
        AND ($2 OR category = ANY($3))
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

ffb298750f0e662348623f8e6d8819e65b6018ba.query: SELECT email FROM signup_tokens WHERE token = $1
